plugins.name: codex-skill
plugins.description: 实现Claude Code与Codex之间的协作开发的插件，注意这个插件与gemini-skill插件不能同时启用

plugins.name: gemini-skill

plugins.name: development-essentials

plugins.name: agent-dev-workflow
plugins.description: Minimal lightweight development workflow with requirements clarification, implementation, and mandatory 90% test coverage
